param.name: warning
param.label: Delete Warning
param.description: This is the text that is displayed immediately before a user deletes his/her account.

param.name: password
param.label: Password
param.description: The text to display before the password field.

param.name: done
param.label: Account sucessfully deleted
param.description: The text to display when the account has been deleted.

param.name: login
param.label: Please log in
param.description: The text to display if the user is not logged in and tries to access this component.

param.name: wrong_password
param.label: Incorrect password
param.description: The text to display if the user enters the wrong password.
